commitResults.messageTitle: Add ability to add and store employee leaves
commitResults.messageBody:
Currently, there is no functionality to add employee leave
records.

The following changes have been made:
- Create Leave model to store leave records
- Implement LeaveCommand to handle adding leave records
- Implement LeaveCommandParser to parse leave input
- Implement JsonAdaptedLeave for JSON serialization
- Update JsonAdaptedPerson to store leave data
- Modify SampleDataUtil to include sample leave records
- Add JsonAdaptedLeaveTest for unit testing JSON serialization

Support for deleting leave records will be added in a future update.

commitResults.messageTitle: Update JsonAdaptedPersonTest to support leave records
Add some tests for new parameters (nric and hire)

commitResults.messageBody: Add ability to add and store employee leaves + Fixing some broken testcases

commitResults.messageTitle: Update new tag commands to use leaves
Fix Nric validation to use proper message constraints
commitResults.messageBody:
Previously, it incorrectly used Name's MESSAGE_CONSTRAINTS instead
of Nric's.

Previously, PersonBuilder always initialized person with the
"friends" tag by default, even when no tags were provided. This
caused unexpected behavior when loading or comparing persons.

Now, PersonBuilder initializes tags as an empty set, ensuring tags
are only added when explicitly specified.
